name: Aliens in Sri Lanka
description:
Ever wonder what Sri Lanka would've been like if aliens made contact back in the days of the ancients?

Here's my take on the famous 5th Century Sigiriya Frescoes. Sigirya is a rock fortress in Sri Lanka that's a real-life, look-alike from Game of Thrones!

Sigirya was declared by Unesco as the 8th wonder of the world, and these ancient paintings on natural rock, that have been preserved for generations to come played a major role in that decision.
